title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.2 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 343.2 - Legal base

State Regulations

Paragraph 6-a of section
19.07
of
the Mental Hygiene Law authorizes the division to establish the alcohol
awareness program for youth as a condition for persons who violate sections
65-b
or
65-c
of the Alcoholic Beverage Control Law, or as an alternative condition of adjournment in contemplation of dismissal for
certain defendants pursuant to subdivision 7 of section
170.55
of the Criminal Procedure

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
343.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
